pr_title: Remove remnants of JVMPI from JIT

timeline.bodyText: You can't fold this away because jvmpiInterface() always returns false, hence this condition is always true.  However, the code below is unconditionally executed now once you do delete jvmpiInterface().
timeline.author: 0xdaryl

replies.bodyText:
Totally agree, my mistake.
Must be fixed now.
replies.author: alexey-anufriev

timeline.message:
Remove remnants of JVMPI from JIT

This patch removes remnants of JVMPI from JIT according to the issue #10022.

Fixes #10022

Signed-off-by: Alexey Anufriev <contact@alexey-anufriev.com>
